column4: Anyone know how to get rid of the stupid mplayer or or whatever it is plugin for firefox? Im trying to watch a movie and it I want the normal flash type player
I think it might be some lame flash replacement or something
ahh, totem
is there something which works better?
Better at playing movies in firefox
You kinda need a front end for iptables, as its not exactly intuitive or easy
not intuitive, no, but there are existing total lockdown scripts, and you're better off modifying that than exposing gnome's codebase
http://www.gametrailers.com/player/12866.html <- as an example
total lockdown scripts?
eh?
scripts that totally shutdown traffic in both directions, port by port
nitricacid: ok
oh right :/
nitricacid: all you need is port 80 open
I think firewalls are somewhat overrated
yes you heard me.
nitricacid: this is not production, so make sure your router is not forwarding to 80
firewalls are pretty much the first line technology- a bad one pretty much means you're screwed
rubbish
nitricacid: yeah
I guess it is.
if you want to tell me why you think that, pm me
